entry.title: Tuesday: Flurries. High minus 8.
entry.summary: Flurries ending late this afternoon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Risk of snow squalls this morning. Local amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 8. Wind chill near minus 14. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 11. POP 30%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening. Flurries beginning near midnight. Wind becoming west 20 km/h gusting to 40 after midnight. Low minus 11. Wind chill minus 10 this evening and minus 19 overnight. Forecast issued 05:00 AM EST Tuesday 31 January 2023
